input.sentences: before leaving their vacation spot | they decide to get a few pictures .
this one was their favorite of the clouds .
they then get a unique shot of the church .
they go inside for a better look .
then | they walk to their rented car to drive to the airport .
output.sentences: It's easy to take pretty pictures at our favorite vacation spot.
Our favorite place is beautiful, even with clouds in the sky.
We can get a unique shot of the church.
The church is very beautiful inside.
It's easy to walk to the church, but we decided to drive the car we rented.
